node_overview_collect_usage: Attempting to collect usage information, this could take a few seconds. Please ensure server is online.
node_overview_collect_disk: Collecting disk usage information, this could take a few seconds.
node_overview_space_used: You are using %s MB of your maximum %s MB of disk space.
node_overview_ajax_no_conn: Unable to connect to the node.
node_overview_ajax_no_exec: Unable to execute command on the server.
node_console_scrollstop_alert: You have selected text in the console. The console will not auto-update when this occurs. This is done to allow you to easily copy or select text in the console. To allow for automatic refreshing again simply un-select the text.
node_files_edit_daemon_error: Unable to connect to the daemon.
node_files_edit_type_error: This type of file cannot be edited via our control panel.
node_files_edit_no_file: No file was specified that can be edited.
node_files_edit_error: You can return to the file manager by clicking here.
node_files_ajax_no_dir: Unable to locate request directory. Error logged.
node_files_ajax_no_dl: Unable to connect to the server to get the files. Please try again.
node_files_ajax_no_edit: This type of file cannot be edited via our online file manager. Please use a FTP client.
node_files_ajax_file_404: The file specified could not be found on the server.
node_settings_ajax_modpack_error: You can not use a disabled form input as a modpack!
node_plugins_welcome: Welcome to your built-in plugin installer. This installer gathers results and data from Bukget and displays them here in an easy to use manner. The automatic installer can be buggy at times, especially for complex plugins. We recommend downloading plugins to your computer first if possible.
node_plugins_installed: Your plugin has been installed successfully.
node_plugins_installing: Please wait while your plugin is installing. This process could take about a minute to complete.
node_plugins_installing_warning: Do not navigate away from this page!
node_plugins_error_term: Please enter a valid search term.
node_plugins_view_author: This plugin is created and maintained by %s.
node_ajax_generic_error: An error was encountered with this AJAX request.
